title: Please help me pick
body: who should i buy wukong, fizz or talon?{{champion:62}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:91}}

replies.body: even though i think hes one of the 3 most broken things in the game....get fizz. hes always strong and never falls out of favor\the meta

i like fizz the best his snowball potential is so much better than the best and he can top,mid,jg if you know what youre doing. The others are fun too talon can burst and wukong has a lot more synergy with other champs and talons ult can burst a team but fizz can go immune and his shark is aoe and a stun and slow with a percent damaging E. This is just my pick and thoughts on it.
